TEXT.TITLE: DANISH WHOLESALE PRICES FALL 0.5 PCT IN FEBRUARY
TEXT.BODY: Denmark's wholesale price index fell 0.5 pct in February, giving a year-on-year fall of 4.9 pct, the National Statistics Office said. The index, base 1980, stood at 135 in February, a fall of one point compared to January, against 142 in February 1986. REUTER
